title: (21400) Ayamonte - 23A Avenida Alcalde Narciso Martín Navarro
title_short: (21400) Ayamonte - 23A Avenida Alcalde Narciso Martín Navarro
description: Good place to stay, no shower and no service but it is spacious and quiet

title: (21409) Ayamonte - 2D Barrio de la Canela
description: Parking fairly level and empty at times other than summer months. Excellent views of the mouth of the Guadiana river with Vila Real de Santo Antonio in front. No services

name: Área de Estacionamiento de Autocaravanas Puerto de Ayamonte
title: (21400) Área de Estacionamiento de Autocaravanas Puerto de Ayamonte
title_short: (21400) Área de Estacionamiento de Autocaravanas Puerto de Ayamonte
description: Brand new motorhome area in Ayamonte. When we discovered it by chance during a bike tour today, it was completely empty. However, the registration and access portal was already active. For the moment, it is not indicated. The place has 48 pitches on asphalt, fenced and monitored by cameras. It's right at the harbor entrance.

title: (21400) Ayamonte - 7 Calle Córdoba
description: Quite quiet free parking for the night, the movement in the morning starts early. Good place to visit the city, the center a few steps away.

title: (8900-201) Vila Real de Santo António - 13 Avenida da República
title_short: (8900-201) Vila Real de Santo António - 13 Avenida da República
description:
Good place for a stopover or first stop after crossing the border. Pretty dusty but flat terrain. Some permanent campers, mainly French. WLAN included, but extremely slow. Convenient supply and disposal. The "village" with the port and the pedestrian area is nice, there are many shops and restaurants (even a camping store), a beautiful main square. Partly dilapidated in side streets.
A tourist tax of €0.50 per person per day is paid. Parking payment is through a machine that does not accept card

title: (8900-201) Vila Real de Santo António - 205 Avenida da República
title_short: (8900-201) Vila Real de Santo António - 205 Avenida da República
description: Sale of gas cartridges, camping gas, gas grill cartridges, camping accessories. small shop opposite the Repsol gas station

title: (8900-201) Vila Real de Santo António - 12 Rua de Angola
title_short: (8900-201) Vila Real de Santo António - 12 Rua de Angola

title: (21400) Ayamonte - Avenida Alcalde Juan Antonio Gonzalez
title_short: (21400) Ayamonte - Avenida Alcalde Juan Antonio Gonzalez
description: Large parking lot with unpaved ground. Used for the flea market on Saturdays. Slept well there and felt safe. Street noise was kept within limits, otherwise quiet at night. Space for enough mobile. Waste bins on site. Only a few trucks and vans were parked there. From there you are quickly in town and in the port. Arriving from the autobahn NOT necessarily through the village, but via the large bypass road.

title: (8900-241) Vila Real de Santo António - 28 Rua 5 de Outubro
title_short: (8900-241) Vila Real de Santo António - 28 Rua 5 de Outubro

description: Laundry service at the Intermarche car park

title: (8900) Vila Real de Santo António -
description: Parking in front of the Intermarche. Wooded and wide area to park day and night. Supermarket gas station next door. Laundry. Washing of vehicles with the possibility of emptying  gray watter in it.

title: (21400) Ayamonte - Av. de la Constitución
description: Public parking of the Supermercado Día. Totally quiet and with shade to spend the day.

title: (8900) Vila Real de Santo António - Unnamed Road
title_short: (8900) Vila Real de Santo António - Unnamed Road
description: A road that goes straight, we did not go far. From both sides the water, fishermen, I think impossible in summer, but end of October perfect, No service, but for us perfect for a break. Next to the Grand Beach Club with free WiFi if close enough. Next to another restaurant with a barking dog at times throughout the night.

title: (8900-211) Vila Real de Santo António - 10 Avenida Ministro Duarte Pacheco
title_short: (8900-211) Vila Real de Santo António - 10 Avenida Ministro Duarte Pacheco
description: Parking of the supermarket Continent. Motorhomes are allowed. No services, big pitches, even for larger motorhomes. Near the park, the center and the football stadium. Don’t park in front of the supermarket loading gate!! Not even on the parking bays. The big trucks need allot of space to turnaround.

title: (21400) Ayamonte - 4 Glorieta de la Junquera
description: Small parking lot, frequented by local residents. Places can be rare. A superb view of the viaduct that spans the Rio Guadiana. No service, but 250 meters from the pedestrian zone and the city center. Not easy access, station at the big cantilever, steep and narrow streets.

title: (21400) Ayamonte - 1C Calle Guatemala
description: BP gas station, has a large motorhome wash

title: (8900) Vila Real de Santo António - Vila Real de Santo António
title_short: (8900) Vila Real de Santo António - Vila Real de Santo António
description: Parking lot in the supermarket, Lidl. no service Was here overnight. Very quiet.

title: (21409) Isla Canela - C. de los Mirlos, 2
title_short: (21409) Isla Canela - C. de los Mirlos, 2
description: Allows pernoita quiet and safe beach

title: (8900) Vila Real de Santo António - 80 N125
title_short: (8900) Vila Real de Santo António - 80 N125
description: LPG Station with very friendly staff that refills camper gas bottles. If you have a german/french/belgian/italian 21.8mm left thread bottle, they have the adapter to fit the portuguese pumps. As long as you do not take the bottle out, they will fill without a problem. It’s a gem when running out of gas and you have a continental cylinder.

title: (8900-106) Vila Real de Santo António - 11 Rua do Marmeleiro
title_short: (8900-106) Vila Real de Santo António - 11 Rua do Marmeleiro
description: Pingo Doce supermarket car park. In the back of the supermarket it is quite quiet and we were able to spend a full day without problems. Some car parks allow parking long vehicles. Container and rubbish bins nearby.

title: (21400) Ayamonte - 28 Calle Islas Canarias
description: Lots of sites next to a road. straight squares. With views of the sea and Portugal. In front of a promenade with a bike lane, litter bins, lampposts and benches. We have not stayed overnight but it seems quiet. during the day very good

title: (21409) Ayamonte - 20 Calle de los Charranes
description: Good place to spend the night on the beach. He does not usually have problems with the police.

title: (21409) Ayamonte - 6 Calle de los Charranes
description: Good place on Isla Canela beach. Do not put awnings or chair if you want to avoid problems with the police. Busy in summer. 100 m from Paradise Beach snack bar, recommended. But no overnight stay accepted

title: (21409) Ayamonte - 2 Calle de los Correlimos
description: The place to spend the day at the beach is fine. There is an area of containers that the garbage truck passes through 2 times, which is somewhat annoying. However, in that same area you can get away a little from those containers and it is a quiet place. Beware of mosquitoes.

title: (8900) Vila Real de Santo António - Unnamed Road
title_short: (8900) Vila Real de Santo António - Unnamed Road
description:
Long driveway where you can park on the side. No motorhomes although there was one when I stayed the night. Forbidden chairs and tables.

Incredible views of the sea, the Guadiana river and the bridge. Access to the beach and path to the reef where there are many kittens.

Nice place for a night and a walk around the area and the beach.

Silent and with little light at night, early in the morning fishermen's cars begin to arrive and put into the river.

title: (8900) Vila Real de Santo António -
description: Praia en san Antonio faro

title: (21409) Isla Canela - 4 Calle de los Mirlos
title_short: (21409) Isla Canela - 4 Calle de los Mirlos
description: Parking with cars where we spent 2 nights, with more ac and civil guard pass without problems. On the beachfront, throughout the day it fills up with cars.

title: (21400) Ayamonte - 112 Ribera del Guadiana
description: The PLG GLP filling station, where can be filled a German gas cylinder, is equipped with an adapter.

name: The Owl
title: (21400) The Owl
description: Nice quiet place, in the middle of nature, with unique and stunning views. You can see high and low tides coming from the sea water, with flamingos in the background and many other animals such as the eagle owl. It is also the perfect spot for stargazing at night and it is only 1.5 km from the center of Ayamonte and 2.5 km from Portugal, which you can visit with the ferry or just cross the bridge by car.

title: (21409) Ayamonte - 23 Paseo de Los Gavilanes
description: Parking places in the street, right next to the beach of Isla Canela. There are several spots along the road so you can even fit large motorhomes and vans. Probably it will be full in the high season, but in low season it's a very good option to go to the beach.

title: (21409) Playa de Isla Canela - 9B Paseo de Los Gavilanes
title_short: (21409) Playa de Isla Canela - 9B Paseo de Los Gavilanes
description: Like a light highway in semi-nature. Very pleasant in the evening and quiet at night, with the sound of crickets at night. Bins nearby across the road, and the beach is a stone's throw from the location. Some dog walks can be disturbing but safe because accompanied by their masters. Ideal to stay there 1 or more days alone or with family. With a magnificent sunset as a bonus! I recommend!

title: (21409) Playa de Isla Canela - 11 Avenida las Codornices
title_short: (21409) Playa de Isla Canela - 11 Avenida las Codornices
description: Place to park we stayed several nights without problem

title: (21409) Ayamonte - 6 Avenida las Codornices
description: Parking area next to the beach, showers practically in front of the parking lot. In the morning it is full, arrive at night or first thing in the morning to get a seat. very close to the bar areas but very quiet and well leveled. not many cars pass except for the day to go to the beach

title: (21400) Ayamonte -
description: Great spot by the border river. View of Ayamonte, the suspension bridge and Portugal.

title: (8950-136) Castro Marim - N125-6
description: Close to the castle of Castro Marim. Can serve as a starting point to visit Reserva Natural do Sapal.

title: () Castro Marim - Unnamed Road
description: In the natural reserve of Castro Marim and San Antonio, ample free parking to visit on foot the natural reserve of birds. Very peaceful place to rest the day. I do not know if we can stay there night, wc in the building opposite. strictly forbidden at night

title: (21409) Ayamonte - 2C Calle de los Mochuelos
description: Parking on the beach ideal for winter. In summer it is full.

title: (21409) Ayamonte - 4D Avenida de los Cisnes
description: Parking with access to the beach. Certainly full in season, but very quiet outside.

title: (21400) Ayamonte -

name: Parque Municipal Campismo de Monte Gordo
title: (8900) Parque Municipal Campismo de Monte Gordo
title_short: (8900) Parque Municipal Campismo de Monte Gordo
description: Parque Municipal Campismo de Monte Gordo. The best pitches are taken by long termers who do not welcome newcomer tourists. However if you are lucky you'll find some where to park which might be level, won't be on quicksand or sloping, will be near enough to an EHU without hanging your cable over the trees. Doubful you will get satellite or be near enough to free office wifi. However, the security is excellent, the toilets are clean.

title: (8950-122) Castro Marim - 113 Rua 25 de Abril
description: A flat car park. There are no services but supermarket and restaurants nearby.

title: (8900) Monte Gordo - R. de Ceuta

title: (8900-435) Monte Gordo - TB Rua de Kinitra
title_short: (8900-435) Monte Gordo - TB Rua de Kinitra
description: Nice launderette in Monte Gordo with a snack bar with terrace next to it. With free parking in front of the door in a quiet neighborhood.

title: (21409) Ayamonte - 7D Calle de los Pelicanos
description: Place to spend a wonderful day at the beach. You can park very well next to an urbanization under construction.

title: (21409) Ayamonte - 7D Calle de los Pelicanos
description: Parking in the Isla Canela area open to any vehicle. We were in July and there was enough space to park the motorhome, plus there is no sign that prohibits staying overnight. The night was quiet, the neighbors very respectful. Recommended, although without services for camper around.

title: (21409) Ayamonte - 10D Avenida de los Cisnes
description: Very quiet place next to the promenade

title: (8950) - Unnamed Road

title: (21409) Ayamonte - 0 Avenida de la Mojarra

title: (21409) Ayamonte - 2D Avenida de la Mojarra
description: Land parking near the beach and the fishing village Punta Del Moral, you can park during the day. We spent the night with no problems as well.

title: (8900-411) Monte Gordo - 10 Avenida Infante Dom Henrique
title_short: (8900-411) Monte Gordo - 10 Avenida Infante Dom Henrique
description: Park very close to the beach . Chargeable,  without services

title: (21400) Ayamonte - 70 Diseminado Fotea
description: Magnificent Emplazamiento to spend the night without noises, explained of the location of the hermitage of Maria Auxiliadora.  Surrounded by nature, picnic area, hermitage, drinking water (ask for the boy that allows to connect and maintain the cleanliness) basin containers, delimited by wood vaults, since all can be accessed by way of the Isla Cristina Seascapes  , Camping and Gasolinera.  To access this area you have to go from the Villa Blanca cross on the N431 through a paved road between Finca de Naranjos.

title: (21400) Ayamonte - Urb. Puente Esuri
description: Calm place. Lots of place to stay

title: (21410) Isla Cristina - 30 Muelle Martínez Catena
description: 24h parking on the banks of the Ría Carreras, at the foot of the pier Martínez Catena, uncrowded, except for vehicles that run in the street and are sometimes fast and noisy during the day, the night is quieter . Far sounds of the engines of boats going fishing. Area of the Sunsets Route and Isla Cristina. Just behind the car park is a very large stretch of sand delimited by a fence of gray blocks where it is also possible to park without any kind of inconvenience. Near the city center, yacht club and fishing port, spectacular views and sunsets on the Ría Carreras.

title: (21410) Isla Cristina - 4B Avenida de la Constitución
title_short: (21410) Isla Cristina - 4B Avenida de la Constitución
description: Esplanade where vehicles park both day and night. There are no services but it is a quiet area to spend the night. Curious anecdote to see a minivan with foreign registration in the center of the area with its particular recreation area. It must take time because it appears on Google maps.

title: (21410) Isla Cristina - 2C Avenida Parque
description: Big parking place, in the center, feels more safe than other parkings in the harbour-area. No shower or toilets

title: (8900) Monte Gordo - 40 Rua da Casa da Audiência
title_short: (8900) Monte Gordo - 40 Rua da Casa da Audiência
description: Place winged from the beach at 200 meters. Parking before the car park as it is restricted to motorhomes. But you sleep quietly without much noise and there is space for about 4. Tonight we are two motorhomes and a Camper. The bar at the entrance to the beach is very good and very good service.

title: (21410) Isla Cristina - 4 Calle D Pp.2
description: Gas station with medium flow water refill, fuel stop and air

title: (21410) Isla Cristina - 4 Calle Isla Mar
description: Parking space along the road. There is a bit of a car during the day but at night it is quieter. We spent a night without a problem, the police came by and it is ok. There is a charge for parking. At 300m you have access to the beach, there are beach showers so top. There is also a small bar to drink or eat tapas right in front of the sea. Very good spot.

title: (8950-101) Monte Gordo - 133 Rua de Retur
description: Area in the middle of nature near praia verde.

name: Camper Park Playas de Luz
title: (21420) Camper Park Playas de Luz
description:
CAMPER PARK BEACHES OF LIGHT | OPEN! Area for motorhomes with all kinds of service. Located in a privileged place due to its views of the marshes, flamingos and other birds. Next to the greenway you can walk to Isla Cristina and by bike to Ayamonte and Islantilla. Nearby there is a public transport stop, restaurants and all kinds of services. AVAILABILITY AND RESERVATIONS ON THE WEB.

Our prices are: €12/night. In May, June and September: €15/night pool included. July, August and Easter: €18/night pool included. Stays of only one night +2€. Our prices include two adults and two children, extra person €3/night. Full rate available at reception and on our website.

title: (21410) Isla Cristina - 11 Urbanización Molino Carreras M14
title_short: (21410) Isla Cristina - 11 Urbanización Molino Carreras M14
description: The parking area of the Dia supermarket. Calm after closing of the supermarket. On the side there is a small playground. In summer, it's more crowded, but like in the rest of the city streets, summer area.

title: (8950) Altura -
description: Site at the foot of the road for 2 or 3 vehicles, ideal for a stop, we stop to eat and rest.

title: (21410) Isla Cristina - 37 Avenida Carnaval de Isla Cristina
title_short: (21410) Isla Cristina - 37 Avenida Carnaval de Isla Cristina
description: Clean launderette, dryer per 12 minutes. Parking spaces in front on the street. Pay with coins only!

title_short: (8950) Altura - 154D Rua de Real Village - Praia Verde

description:
REPSOL GAS STATION

 - Water tap fill tanks (hose required) FREE attached to the car wash

title: (21410) Isla Cristina - 1 Calle Eucalipto
description: Small eucalyptus forest, behind it is the beach with cold water showers and public services. There are also several beach bars and very popular restaurants. A quiet place, near a residential area. High risk of fire in summer, do not stay there at night.

title: (21420) Ayamonte - Autopista del V Centenario
description: Ideal for a break

title: (21410) Isla Cristina - 1A Avenida de la Playa
title_short: (21410) Isla Cristina - 1A Avenida de la Playa
description: Showers and public toilets.

title: (21410) Isla Cristina - 3 Calle Roble
description: Under a shady pine forest. Behind the Hotel ADH Isla Cristina, accessible by the street of the restaurant Rufino (Avenida de la Playa), enter a guarded car park 12h and leaving on the road at the back of the hotel. Having a quiet and safe security guard. Restaurant on one side of the ocean, there are (WC and showers), open from 9:30 to 14:30 and from 15:00 to 19:00. Apart from showers and seaside.

title: (21410) Isla Cristina - 3 Calle Roble
description: On one side of the road, sheltered between the pinos and on the other side, also room for larger motorhomes.

title: (21420) Ayamonte - Unnamed Road
description: In the heart of nature, not far from a motorway exit, a space along a forest track, very pleasant, many locations, easily accessible

name: Camping Giralda Isla Cristina
title: (21410) Camping Giralda Isla Cristina
description: Camping Giralda 5 minutes from the beach. Good attention and service. Sandy beach pitches, there are also compacted earth pitches where motorhomes don't get stuck. Bring something for the mosquitoes at night. In May there are no mosquitoes. good animation Suspension bridges, sports courts etc. Perfect to be at the beach. In the services you have to take the paper at the entrance, before sitting down, they do it to avoid wasting paper and there are fewer jams.

title: (8950-411) Altura - 6 Rua da Liberdade
description: Laundromat in the Intermarché car park

title: (8950) Altura - N125
description: Place for motorhomes, 5 places marked No services, next to a road so spending the night is noisy but allowed

title: (21410) Isla Cristina - 2 A-5054
description:
Parking at the foot of the dirt beach with a beach bar with drinking water showers on the beach toilets where the beach bar confirmed by the civil guard can park and spend the night but not camp the signs prohibiting overnight stays


 they have been removed so you can park and spend the night in any enabled parking lot

title: (21410) Isla Cristina - 2 A-5054
description: Beautiful place surrounded by pine forests and picnic areas, quiet and quiet, only has a fountain and some dumpsters. little traffic right now, no problem to stay overnight. Snack 30 meters and 50 meters from the beach.

title: (8950-414) Altura - 4 Rua do Desembarque das Tropas Liberais
title_short: (8950-414) Altura - 4 Rua do Desembarque das Tropas Liberais
description: Small car park, quite popular during the day because of direct access to the beach, but only two of us slept there that night. It may not be 5 star but it's quiet, flat, and felt more "safe" to us than the wilderness location next door. Quiet night and rather family place. Leave the access to the beach the tractors pass by to clean it at night.

address.street: 4 Rua do Desembarque das Tropas Liberais

title: (8900-037) Vila Nova de Cacela - 19 Rua do Pescador
title_short: (8900-037) Vila Nova de Cacela - 19 Rua do Pescador
description: Quiet beach between two busy beaches.  road in poor condition but it passes with a 6.50 m, parking at the end.  no prohibition sign, just spent the afternoon before return.

title: (8950) Soalheiras - Unnamed Road
description: A nice surprise discovered while looking for a place indicated by the application. Motorable path for any type of vehicle which leads to a large rotating platform surrounded by a row of trees. Very nice 180° view with the sea in the distance. Magnificent sunrise. We were alone in peace. Flat terrain. not far from the road and at the same time not bothered by noise. Only downside, wind in the morning.

name: Parque de Caravanas de Altura - Campo e Mar
title: (8950) Parque de Caravanas de Altura - Campo e Mar
title_short: (8950) Parque de Caravanas de Altura - Campo e Mar
description: We are a new area (Service Area for Motorhomes) with 30 spaces, located in a rural area, 4km from the center of Altura. Come and enjoy nature and enjoy our ocean view.

title: (8950) Soalheiras - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place on a turning platform for small vans. There are two small stone platforms to stand up straight. Quiet street with little traffic and beautiful views. ! !! Please bury your toilet paper and take your rubbish with you ... respect the environment !!!

title: (21410) Isla Cristina - A-5054
description: Picnic area to cross to find this platform next to a beautiful beach. No concerns as of September 20, 2015. calm. Chiringuito "El Portugués" (restaurant) to recommend.

title: (8900-038) Vila Nova de Cacela - 1 Urbanização Orlamar
title_short: (8900-038) Vila Nova de Cacela - 1 Urbanização Orlamar
description: Parking along the street with the other cars. There are no prohibition signs and we had enough space to maneuver in the afternoon. It's a very clean residential area and we felt safe. You can walk to the beautiful beach in 5 minutes. We discovered the place by accident, as parking for mobile homes is forbidden in the parking lots further down on the beach and we actually wanted to give up. But then we stood there for 2h without any problems and had a great time on the beach. There are public toilets and a bistro on the beach.

title: (8950) Altura - A22
description:
Various parking options in an unfinished or abandoned residential area. The parking lots are all a bit sloping .
Nice view and very quiet, only the noise of the highway can be heard slightly.
Access is best via the south-eastern entrance, as the northern entrance is quite broken, but still possible with sufficient ground clearance.

title: (8950-056) Azinhal - 18 Largo do Mercado
description: Small parking space in the village. Quiet for coffee stop, or spend a night there. No service. Some shops. Mini mercado. Coffee. Bankomat counter.

title: (8950) Azinhal - Unnamed Road
description: Spot in the countryside, along the river. Possibility of parking on the side all along the hiking path. Practicable way. Very calm place where one can observe the birds (flamingos, geese, ducks, etc). No service.

title: (8900-038) Manta Rota - 8 Rua da Quinta da Manta Rota
title_short: (8900-038) Manta Rota - 8 Rua da Quinta da Manta Rota
description: Self-Service Laundry, good Miele machines

address.street: 8 Rua da Quinta da Manta Rota

title: (21430) Isla Cristina - A-5054
description: Parking with trees. Lots of shade, chiringuito close access to the beach with showers. Quiet place to sleep. Campsite in front with a supermarket. The site has picnic areas to eat.

name: Camping Playa Taray
title: (21430) Camping Playa Taray
description: Supply and disposal without overnight stay. Restaurant and mini market/bakery on the campsite. Very shady (eucalyptus). The subsoil is mostly solidified soil. The pitches are mostly large. The beach is about 200 meters across the access road and protected by a nature reserve with pine forest for the chameleon. It is a spectacular stretch of unspoilt sandy beach stretching for miles. Beach bar on the beach. WiFi available. Supermarket at 3.5 km.

title: (21430) Isla Cristina - 4 Calle la Chirina
description: Dog playground faucet, non-threaded push button connection, plenty of flow, looks hygienic

name: The Kitefinca
title: (21430) The Kitefinca
description:
CLOSED

Parking at 'the KiteFinca': for campers up to 7.0m. There is a toilet and a hot outdoor shower.
The price is €15 for a motorhome. Each person over 5 years old costs €5
Dog/Cat is free, We have a dog.

Kitesurfing lessons are provided. Longboard (skate) and Stand Up Paddle (sup) lesson (or rental) is also possible.

Check in from 2:00 PM to 9:00 PM at the latest (note: preferably no check-in between 4:00 PM & 7:00 PM)
Check out until 12:00 at the latest

Please note we are an eco-friendly place.
Only use the biodegradable products offered! Be sparing with water! Recycle waste.
We have no point emptying your gray or black water!!!!)

address.street: Finca los Montesillo Camino del charco s/n

name: Alternative Camper Park Nirvana
title: (21590) Alternative Camper Park Nirvana
description: Camper and caravan areas with Rock & Roll bar in the countryside of Villablanca. It's located 15 minutes from the best beaches in Huelva and next to the Portuguese border. Enjoy the area and avoid the crowds.

title: (21430) Isla Cristina - 2 HU-3400
description: Very friendly BP service station, refueling with diesel I was able to empty the gray water tank and fill it with water.

title: (21430) Isla Cristina - A-5054
description: Dusty soil. A lot of shade. Access to the beach where there are toilets and showers. For the day only

title: (21430) Isla Cristina - A-5054
description: Place under a pine forest by the sea very shaded good spot especially for van and vans arranged a beach bar is installed nearby. Not far from the road but we hear very little traffic. Wild camping prohibited. For the day only

title: (8900) Vila Nova de Cacela - 131 EM509
description: Nice place for overnight, on the top of the hills where you have a nice Ocean view. The highway is near but the noise is very tolerable and absent during the night. In Spring is full of grass and flowers!

title: (8900-067) Vila Nova de Cacela - 162 Avenida Manuel G. Rosa Mendes
title_short: (8900-067) Vila Nova de Cacela - 162 Avenida Manuel G. Rosa Mendes
description: Water point (ar-aqua) in very good condition next to the gas station. A very nice gentleman yours. I thought I saw toilets too. There is a garage too, it can be used.

name: Camping Luz
title: (21430) Camping Luz
description: Campsite with some large pitches. Free WiFi throughout the campsite. Free sockets in the toilet building. Bathrooms and showers in modern sanitary building with adjustable temperature without having to press the button every now and then. The beach is a 15 minute walk from the campsite. No disposal option for vehicles with holding tank! Unsuitable for caravans with a height >3.0 m and/or >7.5 m length

title: (8950) Azinhal -
description: High spot with a view of a dry lake. The track to get there is very passable. There is space for a van or motorhome, but other spots around the lake are available. Very peaceful night in the middle of nature.

title: (8950) - Rua de Beliche
description: At the edge of Lake Beliche, "the wheels in the water", or a little higher flatter location, beautiful place, very quiet. Accessible trail.

title: (8950) tanoeiro - Unnamed Road
description: In the distance, 1 km from the road, on a gravel road. With a vehicle 6.5m long, you can turn. Space for 2 motorhomes / vans. Located directly on a lake. Very very calm.

name: Camping Calico
title: (8900) Camping Calico
description: CAMPING CALICO - Very nice campsite with swimming pool and bar. Ability to drain gray and black water and fill with water for free. Very nice welcome in French, English or Spanish with a visit of the campsite to choose its location. Price in high season for a van, 2 adults, 1 dog and electricity: 25 euros

title: (21590) Villablanca - Unnamed Road
description: Secluded parking lot on the outskirts of a small village. Little traffic.

title: (21430) Isla Cristina - 2A Calle Ballena
description: Parking at the beach, only to go during the low season. In high season it is BLUE zone and it is PROHIBITED

title: (8900) Vila Nova de Cacela - 8900 Rua de Fábrica
title_short: (8900) Vila Nova de Cacela - 8900 Rua de Fábrica
description: Free Municipal Car Park in Fabrica. It’s the Ferry Point to the Fabrica National Park Area and Superb Beach . Amazing wild life. We arrived early at 07:30 as it’s full by 09:30.  at low tide . and waded across. Not sure if overnight is allowed no obvious signs. It may be ok for a small camper van roof down. Nice Cafe and Loos plus water. Crossings by Ferry are between 09:00 and return 20:30 for two euros return. depending on season and tides. Well with a visit.

title: (8900) Vila Nova de Cacela -
description:
Very quiet car park
Asphalt ground + paved
On a parking lot next to a "zoo" which is closed for the moment, peaceful night with very little traffic

title: (21449) Lepe - 23J Avenida de Islantilla
description: It is a free central car park all year except in August, there are more than 100 spaces, it is between trees, and there is no prohibition.

title: (8800) Vila Nova de Cacela - Unnamed Road
title_short: (8800) Vila Nova de Cacela - Unnamed Road
description: Free in the pine forest. Only for smaller buses without alcove. Not exactly flat. No supply, but rest ;-)

title: (8800) - EM1236
description: 2 parking spaces 10 mtrs off the road adjacent to a local nature park that does not allow motorhomes. The park is quite big but not on a map. Did not stay but appeared fine for day or night. No services, seating and bin close by. Only downside is a power cable overhead. View to sea and Spain,

title: (21449) Lepe - 23 Calle Trascefiro
description: Park mix right in the center of the city. It has no support services. Tuesday's market, have to leave.

title: (8950) Odeleite - EM1063
description: Not far from the lake and the dam no service

title: (21449) Lepe - 15 Avenida Isla Cristina
description: Parking near the beach 2 minutes walk to the beach and restaurants. A great place with great beaches. quiet and safe in low season.

title: (8950-012) Almada de Ouro - EM1063
description: Quiet parking with a magnificent view of the lake, warm welcome. Beautiful walks around. Service area belonging to a hunters association. Access to the association's bar, very low prices for drinks, free toilet and shower and TV. Good restaurant (Casa Merca) in Odeleite (2 km by a hiking trail) regional cuisine at low prices

title: (21449) Lepe - 4H Avenida la Antilla
description: Parking day and night in the center of La Antilla. Very quiet and spacious, has no shade, but is surrounded by bars and 5 minutes walk from the beach. Despite being close to the road, we slept very quietly.

title: () Odeleite - 2 Rua 5 de Outubro
description: Large car park near the dam. Maybe noisy in season but quiet out of season. On the right coming from Castro Marim (otherwise make a U-turn at the intersections)

title: (8950) Azinhal -
description: Magnificent place easy to access by motorhome 6m50 the slopes are good. Water accessible at 50m. No waste. To conserve !!

title: (8950) Odeleite - 2 Rua Luís Xavier
description: Ample place to spend the night on the outskirts of the small town. Quiet and with some shade. Unfortunately the river water is somewhat stagnant so it does not seem suitable for swimming.

title: (8950) Azinhal - Unnamed Road
description: Parking in the middle of nature, slightly uneven. Access by dirt track of 2 km.

title: (8950) - N122
description: Picnic park with tables and barbecue, beautiful view of the dam.

title: (21449) Lepe - 64 Calle Sotavento
description: Parking near the beach without problems for the night ... Beach at 300 meters. Without services, only parking. Track karts stuck for children. In the summer, late in the afternoon and on weekends it can be difficult to park. Supermarkets nearby. It is advisable to park backwards because the parking spaces are short for motorhomes. If there is no room, you can park as well. In the surroundings

title: (8950) Odeleite - EM507-2
description: Quiet parking lot right by the river in Foz de Odeleite. Standing undisturbed for a few days, fresh fish from the fishermen.... The restaurant opposite is closed and for sale. Nice stopover to continue north.

title: (21449) Lepe - 11 Calle Cervantes
description: Quiet parking near the beach. WARNING, ON THE FIRST LINE OF THE BEACH FORBIDDEN PARKING MOTORHOMES AND CARAVANS.  Public showers right in front and a quiet place with the usual passage of people at peak times. We will try to sleep here.

name: Courela das Perdizes
title: (8800-064) Courela das Perdizes
description:
Small private space for 1 motorhome or 2 (if you travel together). Amassing view, secure and private. 
Potable water is possible (just ask Manuel). If you want a quiet peaceful night, this is the place to go!

title: (8950) - Unnamed Road
description:
Amazing place to spend the day and / or night (you'll just hear the sound of wildlife). The 360 ​​° landscape offers a wonderful and peaceful  panorama, moreover you'll can swim ! 

The place is clean, hope everyone will respect this.

title: (8950) Odeleite - N122
description: Quiet place to spend the night, with a breathtaking view of the lake.

title: (21449) Lepe - 3 Calle Estero del Fraile
description: Esplanade near the beach. They have fixed this space and you can spend the night in peace without problems.

title: (8950) Odeleite - Unnamed Road
description: Small spot next to very calm road with hardly any traffic. Directly at the lake. Easy to access and space for a big bus (10m without problems), or two vans. Slightly uneven but lots of stones around for levelling. Nice access for bathing, clear water and clean environment. Very calm, no services, keep it clean!

title: (21440) Lepe - 2A Calle Fuentenueva
description: Large parking lot with areas of asphalt, block pavement and sand. Next to a playground and adult exercising machines. On the road opposite, small supermarket, laundry and other shops.

title: (8950) - Unnamed Road
description: Access for a single small vehicle, combi or van. Possibility of bathing. We sat down for dive, I saw no ban to spend the night but it is to check. Quiet corner in the quiet of any passage, no shade but windy corner.

title: (21440) Lepe - 1 Calle Isla Canela
description: We stopped to make an overnight stay. Very quiet.

title: (21440) Lepe - 3 Calle Fuentenueva
description: Public parking lot quite large next to the soccer field. Ideal to visit the city.

title: (21440) Lepe - 3 Calle Rubalcaba
description: New laundry very clean. 2x 12kg each 5Euro, 1x 14kg to 7Euro, 2 dryers at 2Euro for 20 minutes. Opposite is a large car park, paying on the asphalt, and free on the sand.

title: (8950) - IC27
description: Location for two vehicles slightly sloping walkable path 100 m from the lake a small road very very uncrowded quiet place

name: Camping Antilla
title: (21440) Camping Antilla
description: Antilla Campsite

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Many places to sit in 4X4 among a network of tracks. Be careful to get there you have to go through a village with narrow streets.

title: (8950) - Unnamed Road
description: Superb slightly off-road spot for backpackers, one place flat.

title: (8800-593) Tavira - 1 Largo da República
description: Flat gravel parking, between residences, without any prohibition and free. Ideal for parking and access to the Cabanas beach. 5min walk from the boarding dock for Cabanas beach. Restaurants and bakery nearby. We spent a quiet night there (a few passing cars since residential area).

title: (21440) Lepe - 28 Calle Alfareros
description:
Fontana pubblica con tubo già installato, dove si può fare rifornimento di acqua potabile.
Sono riuscito a fare full in 10 minuti.

title: (8800-594) Cabanas - 55D Avenida Ria Formosa
description: Unpaved land. Arrive before 10 am to have a place to park .

name: Camping Ria Formosa.
title: (8800-593) Camping Ria Formosa.
description: Campsite with swimming pool, large clean sanitary facilities, pitch for motorhomes, pleasant reception there is even a washing area for motorhomes located one kilometer from the sea. Wifi is free.

title: (8800-591) Tavira - 110a Rua Comandante Henrique Tenreiro
description: Port parking with water tap, Quiet off season spot I Guess. That in season it is shielded.. Cabanas are very typical and authentic friendly...

title: (8800-591) Tavira - 91A Rua A
description:
Parking spaces in urban area (or some hotels). almost empty now (after season). very little traffic. line of trees can provide maybe some shade in summer. we think nice alternative to the marina spot.

keep the nature clean and do not leave any traces!

title: (8800) Tavira -
description: Ideal place to spend the night, even in laughter, when she does not run, very calm and cool

title: (21591) San Silvestre de Guzmán - Cam de Barcialonga
title_short: (21591) San Silvestre de Guzmán - Cam de Barcialonga
description: Parking to visit the windmill. There are beautiful routes for walking and mountain biking.

title: (8800-225) Tavira - R. Beatriz Costa
description: Asphalt parking lot at the end of the village, no prohibition signs! We spent a quiet night without any problems with two other campers on site. Many residents with dogs on the way.

title: (8800) Tavira - 130 Rua da Cruz Vermelha Portuguesa
title_short: (8800) Tavira - 130 Rua da Cruz Vermelha Portuguesa
description: Parking in the large unpaved parking lot of the sports complex on the outskirts of the village. With trees that shield you from the road. Hardly any traffic but the dogs barking was a bit loud. But ok for one night. Arrived in the dark and left in the dark.

name: Algarve Motorhome Park Tavira
title: (8800-228) Algarve Motorhome Park Tavira
description:
Reception area and services for motorhomes, close to the centre of Tavira, to the beach, to the Saltworks and to the "Via  Algarviana"(walking and cycling route). Pitches of at least 70m2, with individual electrical hook-up, water, free wifi, showers, laundry service, petanque areas, selective waste sorting, video monitoring. Open 365 days a year. Visa-MC-Multibanco payment. Restaurants and shops nearby.
WE DON'T ACCEPT BOOKINGS, THE NUMBER OF PLACES AVAILABLE IS ALWAYS UPDATED ON OUR WEBSITE

title: (8800) Tavira - Unnamed Road
description: Public showers and toilets on the Island of Tavira. Totally free. Good condition but cold water.

title: (8800) Tavira - N125
description: Self service laundry , very easy access

title: (21459) El Rompido -
description: In wild nature ! The road is a bit bumpy but doable. It is a nature reserve.

title: (8800-318) Tavira - 4 Rua Almirante Cândido dos Reis
title_short: (8800-318) Tavira - 4 Rua Almirante Cândido dos Reis
description: Free parking to spend a day, on the roadside, just in front of the large shopping center Continente, at the roundabout. dusty, unshaded, 8 minutes by bike from downtown.

title: (8800-602) Tavira - 107K Estrada das 4 Águas
description: Parking at the pier to go to the island of Tavira. Normally forbidden to spend the night. Very calm no car.

title: (8800) Tavira -
description: Small clearing on the right of a dirt road where there are other spots reported shortly before. We found it since the other spots were already taken, very quiet and clean, with 360 degree and starry views guaranteed in good weather. Keep this area clean!

title: (8800-318) Tavira - 2 Rua Almirante Cândido dos Reis
title_short: (8800-318) Tavira - 2 Rua Almirante Cândido dos Reis
description: Washer and dryer, washing machine 8 kg 4 euros, 18 kg 8 euros, dryer 18 kg, coffee at the gas station, parking Tariva 100m further for almost all lengths. Big shopping center

title: (8800-661) Tavira - 2 Beco Governador Abdallad
description: Free urbanization parking. Very quiet and close to the shopping center 100 meters.

title: (8800) Tavira -
description: Quiet place in the mountains with amazing 360 degree view

title: (21450) Cartaya - 4 Sector Suelo Sapu R-4
description: Nice place by the river. To stay safe overnight. There is a shower in front of the bar. Car parking spaces.

title: (8800-318) Tavira - 237 Rua Almirante Cândido dos Reis
title_short: (8800-318) Tavira - 237 Rua Almirante Cândido dos Reis
description: We parked here during the day to go visit the city of Tavira, we prefer it before going into the center as the car parks are limited to 2.5 meters high and 5 meters long, a good choice for walking to the tourist area

title: (21450) - 3E Solar Suelo Sapu R-2
description: Quiet place, next to the Ribera de Cartaya

title: (21450) - 2E Solar Suelo Sapu R-2
description: Quiet place to spend the night, it is a parking lot for cars, but there is never any parked

title: (8800-367) Tavira - 82 Rua José Joaquim Jara
description: It is a quiet place. A good alternative.

title: (8970) Laranjeiras - EM507
description: Beautiful spot near a small restaurant.  4 or 5 places maximum.  Great view over the river. The restaurant is open all day and evening.  They are very friendly and have breakfast,  lunch, drinks, dinner. They often grill some meat or fish on the bbq. There is a toilet, always open. You can ask for water and electricity.  There is a small Roman village near and many nice walks.

title: (8800-346) Tavira - Av. Dom Manuel I
description:
Parking near the ferry landing.
For vehicles up to 5m in length.

title: (8800-318) Tavira - 7/1 Travessa Herculano Rocha
description: Free parking next to the river. Centric Some cars in front

title: (8800) Tavira - Unnamed Road
description: At the top of a hill, the ocean on the horizon, no house nearby, no passage, super quiet to spend the night. Slightly rocky path to get there but accessible to all vehicles.

title: (8800-346) Tavira - 172 Largo Doutor José Pires Padinha
title_short: (8800-346) Tavira - 172 Largo Doutor José Pires Padinha
description: Laundry 7 and 14 kg id3m dryers Open from 07:00 to 24:00. multiple washing machines and dryers (3) parking with camper difficult. free Wi-Fi.

title: (8800-397) Tavira - 66 Rua dos Mártires da República
title_short: (8800-397) Tavira - 66 Rua dos Mártires da República
description: Quiet area with many large parking spaces for AC, campers and vans. 10 minutes walking from the center. Free.

title: (8800-412) Tavira - 1 Praceta Florbela Espanca
description: Battery parking in quiet area and payment, but it is that the city is very bad to park motorhome, I have gone to 3 parking that put the application and there was no place or it is not too small to park. Here at least I park and I see the city

title: (8800-422) Tavira - 49 Rua do Poeta Isidoro Pires
title_short: (8800-422) Tavira - 49 Rua do Poeta Isidoro Pires
description: In the street free parking, near downtown

title: (8800-351) Tavira - 59 Rua João Vaz Corte Real
title_short: (8800-351) Tavira - 59 Rua João Vaz Corte Real
description: Perfect for parking and seeing Tavira. Free parking shared with cars.

title: (8800) Tavira - 100Z Rua João Vaz Corte Real
title_short: (8800) Tavira - 100Z Rua João Vaz Corte Real
description: We spent the night without any problem, we just had a little noise in the morning because there is a train which passes not far and people who work super early, at 5am! personally I did not hear anything but my husband did.

title: (8800-407) Tavira - 14 Rua George Rosado
description: Parking where you can park and even spend the night quiet (in December). No service. Next to the city center. Suitable for small motorhomes and vans.

title: (8800) Colos -
description: Small recess on the track, sheltered from the wind. We spent a peaceful night with the ocean in the distance

title: (8800-657) Tavira - 55 Rua dos Mouros
description: DigiGas - refill gas bottle station

title: (21459) El Rompido - 12 Puerto de El Rompido
title_short: (21459) El Rompido - 12 Puerto de El Rompido
description: Parking at the port of Rompido (pier stones, next to the Pier FlechaMar). In the summer very complete. Calm

title: (8800) Colos -
description: Small but straight pitch with lots of cairns. Good for one night.

title: (21459) El Rompido - 1 Calle Longueron
description: You can park without restrictions

title: (8800) - 606D Rua de Beliche de Cima
description: Hand Laundry Spot. Fresh Water, but not potable.

title: (21450) Cartaya - 5 Avenida Aljaraque
description: Open Blue Laundromat. Four washing machines and three dryers

title: (21459) El Rompido - 2V Urbanización S a P U R-10
title_short: (21459) El Rompido - 2V Urbanización S a P U R-10
description: Public parking in El Rompido, very spacious, there is shade due to the large trees. Near the port and the leisure area (2 minutes). You can hear the traffic but nothing annoying. Arriving here as the port parking is full in summer.

address.street: 2V Urbanización S a P U R-10

title: (8970) Vaqueiros - Unnamed Road
description: Parking during the day only along the road. Not recommended for overnight stays.

title: (21450) Cartaya - 820 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Large public ground-level parking lot. Street next door, but not busy. We spent one night here without any problems.

title: (21459) El Rompido - 53 Calle Luis Daoiz
description: Public free park with no services but near the village centre and beach. quiet area to rest. we spent 1 night. without problems

title: (21450) Cartaya - 76 Plaza Industrial la Estación
description: Small water tap in front of the car wash of a small gas station. Also ideal for large canisters, hose connection may be possible (depending on the thread). Low pressure. Water tastes a bit like chlorine, as usual in Spain

title: (21450) Cartaya - HU-3402
description: Lukoil gas station with cheaper than average fuel. service is fill and empty, even sewage. For water ask for the key at the shop. You have a cafe and you can dine there. Sale of Repsol propane gas bottle.

title: (8950) Fortes - 710X Rua de Fortes
description: Very quiet place in winter, in summer a lot of people go. Good for vans.

title: () Alcoutim - EM507
description: South of Alcoutim, surrounded by nature and grandiose. Departure of hikes. Panoramic view of the Guadiana.

title: (8800) - N397
description: Small but enough pavement on this hilly road, perfect for a night stay! On right of it a small pavement road to a place between hills, completely out of sight! No services!

title: (8800) Santa Luzia - 38 Avenida Engenheiro Duarte Pacheco
title_short: (8800) Santa Luzia - 38 Avenida Engenheiro Duarte Pacheco
description: Clean public toilets

title: (21459) - 6 Urbanizacion Urverosa Playa E. D.
description: Beautiful place on the banks of the estuary, there is a height barrier, we have not spent the night, although if there were several vans, we have seen it walking

title: (8800) Palheirinhos - Unnamed Road
description: In the heart of nature on a small dirt road. Superb view of the surrounding hills.

title: (8800) Tavira - 3 N270
description: This is a small parking area. I spent a real quit night here from Sturday to Sunday on September.

title: () Santa Luzia - 56 Rua Joaquim Soares
description: Parking at the entrance of the village. Beautiful seaside with a view of a small moored fishing boat. No services. Excellent restaurants. Residents are discouraged.

title: (8800-562) Santa Luzia - 2 Rua José de Brito Panela
title_short: (8800-562) Santa Luzia - 2 Rua José de Brito Panela
description: Line parking under some trees. Very close to the dirt parking lot, but that one is usually always full. We spent the night 4 motorhome as well and without any problem. There are containers to deposit garbage quite close and the boat that brings you to the beach . the way is 3 minutes walking.

title: (8800-552) Santa Luzia - 56 Rua Joaquim Soares
description: Convenient off road parking, day parking only

title: (8800) Santo Estevão -
description: Nice spot to stay overnight with o wonderful view, few cars passing by and almost none during the night!!

title: (21450) Cartaya -
description: Quiet recreational area with tables and bbq installation. Slept like a baby. Pine trees for shade. Views and birdsong. Relativly flat. Several trails to choose from Wikiloc and Trailforks. Two roads in: take the one from A-5058. Last bit is a dirt road. Hard sand all the way but potholes in several places. No problem driving a 7m sprinter van. You do not need a 4x4. If you do not like dirtroad for your van: choose another place! Do not take the other road from the north. Its in very bad shape. This place is really clean: please keep it clean and do not leave any trash or toiletpaper visible when you leave! Thanx and enjoy❤️
